description: Returns a list of all frameworks for an Amazon Web Services account and Amazon Web Services Region.

nested_items.name: Frameworks
nested_items.description: The frameworks with details for each framework, including the framework name, Amazon Resource Name (ARN), description, number of controls, creation time, and deployment status.

nested_items.name: FrameworkName
nested_items.description: The unique name of a framework. This name is between 1 and 256 characters, starting with a letter, and consisting of letters (a-z, A-Z), numbers (0-9), and underscores (_).

nested_items.name: FrameworkArn
nested_items.description: An Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies a resource. The format of the ARN depends on the resource type.

nested_items.name: FrameworkDescription
nested_items.description: An optional description of the framework with a maximum 1,024 characters.

nested_items.name: NumberOfControls
nested_items.description: The number of controls contained by the framework.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that a framework is created, in ISO 8601 representation. The value of CreationTime is accurate to milliseconds. For example, 2020-07-10T15:00:00.000-08:00 represents the 10th of July 2020 at 3:00 PM 8 hours behind UTC.

nested_items.name: DeploymentStatus
nested_items.description: The deployment status of a framework. The statuses are:

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: An identifier that was returned from the previous call to this operation, which can be used to return the next set of items in the list.
